channel.title: Dakota Smith Blog
channel.description: High-performance personal blog featuring engineering projects, web development insights, and technical tutorials.

item.title: How I Built APL: Turning Claude Code into an Autonomous Dev Team
item.description: A deep dive into building APL, an autonomous coding agent that uses phased workflows, self-learning, and multi-agent orchestration.
item.author: dakota@twofold.tech (Dakota Smith)

item.title: Building a Claude Code Plugin Marketplace for CMS Analysis
item.description: How I built a marketplace of specialized Claude Code plugins that analyze Sitecore, Umbraco, and Optimizely codebases.
item.author: dakota@twofold.tech (Dakota Smith)

item.title: How APL Built This Entire Blog While I Watched
item.description: A behind-the-scenes look at how my autonomous coding agent APL built this Next.js blog from spec to deployment.
item.author: dakota@twofold.tech (Dakota Smith)
